tasks.label: Geth Light Node (Homestead)
tasks.description: Downloads all block headers, block data, and verifies some randomly.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --syncmode light --http.vhosts '*' --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Fast Node (Homestead)
tasks.description: Downloads all blocks (including headers, transactions and receipts), verifies all headers, and downloads the state and verifies it against the headers.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --syncmode fast --http.vhosts '*' --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Full Node (Homestead)
tasks.description: Downloads all blocks (including headers, transactions and receipts) and generates the state of the blockchain incrementally by executing every block.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --syncmode full --http.vhosts '*' --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Archive (Homestead)
tasks.description: Downloads all blocks (including headers, transactions, receipts, and traces), verifies all headers, and downloads the state and verifies it against the headers.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --syncmode full --http.vhosts '*' --gcmode archive --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Light Node (Goerli)
tasks.description: Start a light synce node on the Goerli testnet.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --goerli --syncmode fast --http.vhosts '*' --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Fast Node (Goerli)
tasks.description: Start a fast sync node on the Goerli testnet.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --goerli --syncmode fast --http.vhosts '*' --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Light Node (Rinkeby)
tasks.description: Start light sync node on Rinkeby testnet.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --rinkeby --syncmode light --http.vhosts '*' --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Fast Node (Rinkeby)
tasks.description: Start fast sync node on Rinkeby testnet.
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --rinkeby --syncmode fast --http.vhosts '*' --cache 2048 --http --http.api eth,net,web3 --ws --graphql --metrics || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Dev Node (1337)
tasks.command: tmux new -s geth geth --dev --allow-insecure-unlock || tmux a -t geth

tasks.label: Geth Terminal
tasks.description: Start an interactive Geth command line session.
tasks.command: tmux new -s gethcli geth attach || tmux a -t gethcli

tasks.label: Stop Geth Node
tasks.description: Stop any running Geth node in this instance.

tasks.label: Bash Terminal
tasks.command: tmux new -s myterminal || tmux a -t myterminal
